data.actual_result: If you change your phone language into languages which has different type of numbers like Arabic ( 7 =  ۷), your tag will appear with that language until you close discord.
data.expected_result: Tag #0000 should've appeard as what discord language is set not phone's.
data.short_description: Discord tag/phone language with different type of numbers
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your phone's language to Arabic (I also tested with Persian/Farsi too, not sure if all phones have it) - Log out your account - Close discord (not very necessary) - Login and check your tag #0000
